reviewText: Being a history buff, I never realized that there were Jewish resistance groups outside of the Jewish ghettos during WWII.  Most folks know that there was resistance to Nazi occupation in the Warsaw ghetto, some may know that there was at least one attempted rebellion in one of the deathcamps of WWII, but very little is said about the Jewish partisans during this period of world history.  Would recommend it to any history teacher when focusing on this period of history.
I loved the movie and am very glad that it was reccommended to me by Patriot Nurse. Very interesting movie!
It is good to know about the Jews resisting the atrocities.  I never knew about their fight before. I think that my impression was that there was no resistance.

This video tells about the survival of thousands of Jews during WW2 in an area taken by the Germans. Personal experiences are given by many of the survivors. This is the first time many of these stories are made public.
Very quick delivery. I was very impressed with the movie. Very well done. It gave a history of a Jewish resistance group in WW II.

you never hear about the jewish resistance during wwII
but this really shows you the hardship they faced
during this terrable time
Well worth watching how people can overcome great hardship.  Human spirit rises above hate and untold adversity. It is just a great bit of history.

This video puts to rest the great lie of WWII which is that the Jewish people did not resist the Nazis. This video documents the many ways resistance occurred by Jews, against the Nazis, during the Holocaust.

Caught in an outrageous situation, these people became not just survivors but heroes, capable of accomplishing things they probably never thought they could when they were very young. When human beings are faced with a seemingly impossible situation, they either meet the challenge head on (which these people did) or they succomb. The individuals in this video never succombed. It wasn't easy for them but it showed me what a person is capable of when he absolutely believes in him/herself and feels a strong sense of purpose. Very, very inspiring!
I find WWII events (European Theatre) very interesting. I do find most interest in the actions of the "other side" and their actions against the Axis powers.  As I said, "Good Documentary".
Everyone one who wants to force others to give up their guns should watch this.

Good documentary.  People only see the Jewish people walking to their deaths and yet here were many Jews fighting to stay alive and help their brothers.  This is important to know so I loved this video.
Very good documentary
Very good history lesson. Also gives consideration to government over reach.
Fine Product
Good quality esp. for a slightly older program. Timeless, poignant message for all lovers of freedom and liberty around the world.
